page.title: 17Visitor's Guide (1)
page.content: {A VISITOR'S GUIDE TO THE SURROUNDING {AREA. VISITORS COME TO SPENNYMOOR PRIMARILY TO SEE FRIENDS OR RELATIVES NOT TO SEE THE TOWN.HOWEVER SPENNYMOOR ENJOYS A CENTRALLY SITUATED POSITION WITHIN THE COUNTY WITH ACCESS TO AN EXCELLENT TRANSPORT COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEM THUS MAKING IT AN ATTRACTIVE HOME-BASE FOR VISITORS WHO WISH TO SAMPLE THE IMMENSE VARIETY OF ATTRACTIONS AVAILABLE WITHIN THE IMMEDIATE AREA. THE AREA ENJOYS A RICH HISTORICAL HERITAGE & HISTORICAL LOCATIONS WITHIN AN HOURS DRIVE INCLUDE DURHAM CATHEDRAL, RECENTLY VOTED THE FINEST PIECE OF ARCHITECTURE IN THE WORLD, ESCOMBE SAXON CHURCH, FINCHALE PRIORY, EGGLESTONE ABBEY & THE BISHOP'S PALACE AT BISHOP AUCKLAND.
